ru.borisevich.emailgenerator.functional

Class AuthTokenContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.borisevich.emailgenerator.functional.AuthTokenContainer

  • public class AuthTokenContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, containing tokens of all authorized users. It also manages all tokens (generates, adds to List etc.) Only one instance is allowed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static AuthTokenContainer instance
      Instance of class.
      private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenList
      List of active tokens for authorized users.
